Notes: A destroyable light post that spawns three Star Bits when destroyed. This can be done by using a Spin Attack, the Spin Drill, the Rock power-up or by shooting a Star Bit at it. Can be targeted and destroyed by the Orange Luma as well.

Obj_arg0.Name: Spawn Coin?
Obj_arg0.Description: If enabled, it will spawn a single Coin when destroyed.
